Directions: In a bowl, combine the cauliflower, onions and water chestnuts. In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, lemon juice and salad dressing mix. Pour over vegetables; toss to coat. Cover and chill for at least 2 hours. Just before serving, stir in radishes.
Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained and halved
2 tablespoons dry ranch salad dressing mix
